# commandBuffer

**Instance Property**

Returns the command buffer that is currently encoding commands.

## Declaration

```swift
var commandBuffer: (any MTL4CommandBuffer)? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property may return undefined results if you call it after calling [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandEncoder/endEncoding()].
title: commandBuffer
